name: Orbimesh Document Analysis Agent
description: Professional WORD DOCUMENT processing agent for DOCX, TXT, and PDF files ONLY. NOT for spreadsheets (CSV, Excel) - use Spreadsheet Agent for those. Capabilities: RAG-based Q&A, document display, advanced Word editing (formatting, tables, images, lists).

endpoints.description: Answer questions about document content using RAG. USE for Q&A on DOCX, PDF, TXT files. DO NOT USE for spreadsheets (use Spreadsheet Agent). READ-ONLY. LLM-DRIVEN.

parameters.name: vector_store_path
parameters.description: Path to FAISS vector store for a single document

parameters.name: vector_store_paths
parameters.description: Paths to multiple vector stores for multi-doc analysis

endpoints.description: Render document preview to canvas. USE for viewing document content. DO NOT USE for analysis or editing. READ-ONLY. DETERMINISTIC.
Create new Word document from instruction or content. USE for generating DOCX, TXT, PDF files. DO NOT USE for spreadsheets. CREATES NEW FILE. LLM-DRIVEN IF USING INSTRUCTION.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Direct content for the document (optional if using reference_file_path or instruction)

parameters.name: reference_file_path
parameters.description: Path to a source file to transform (e.g., PDF, TXT) into a new document

parameters.name: instruction
parameters.description: Natural language instruction for LLM to generate or transform content (e.g., 'Create a summary report')

endpoints.description: Modify existing Word document content. USE for text/table edits in DOCX files. DO NOT USE for spreadsheets. MODIFIES DATA. LLM-DRIVEN.
Revert last document edit. USE for undoing recent changes. DO NOT USE for initial file operations. MODIFIES DATA. DETERMINISTIC.
Re-apply previously undone edit. USE after undo operation. DO NOT USE without prior undo. MODIFIES DATA. DETERMINISTIC.
List document edit history and versions. USE for reviewing changes. DO NOT USE for actual edits. READ-ONLY. DETERMINISTIC.
